Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Enzyme Inhibitor/Protein Kinase Inhibitor/Serine Threonine Kinase Inhibitor/Raf Kinase Inhibitor/RAF Kinase Inhibitor XL281
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: An orally active, small molecule with potential antineoplastic activity. XL281 specifically inhibits RAF kinases, located downstream from RAS in the RAS/RAF/MEK/ERK kinase signaling pathway, which may result in reduced proliferation of tumor cells. RAS mutations may result in constitutive activation of the RAS/RAF/MEK/ERK kinase signaling pathway, and have been found to occur frequently in human tumors.
